song.eTitle: Open Now Thy Gates of Beauty

verses.verse: Open now Thy gates of beauty, Zion, let me enter there, Where my soul in joyful duty Waits for God who answers prayer. Oh, how blessed is this place, Filled with solace, light, and grace!
Here Thy praise is gladly chanted, Here Thy seed is duly sown; Let my soul, where it is planted, Bring forth precious sheaves alone. So that all I hear may be Fruitful unto life in me.
Thou my faith increase and quicken, Let me keep Thy gift divine; How soe'er temptations thicken, May Thy Word still o'er me shine As my guiding star through life, As my comfort in all strife.
